# Unity-generated folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/

# User-specific settings
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Unity Cache
MemoryCaptures/
*.stacktrace
*.bak
*.old

# Large files you might not want to push
*.mp4
*.avi
*.mov
*.wav
*.zip
*.rar
*.7z
*.psd
*.tga
